title: Yahoo Lifestyle
text: You can choose how to respond to current circumstances even when events seem out of your control. Unfortunately, your emotional insecurities might blind you from recognizing how you surrender your power to another person. If youre on the defensive, youre probably reacting on someone elses terms rather dictating your own. The first step to recovering your full agency is to accept what is beyond your command, like the weather and other peoples schedules. Fate is what happens to you; free will is what you do. Napoleon Hill wrote, No one can make you jealous, angry, vengeful, or greedy unless you let him. Get Your Complete Cosmic Profile
